DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare bioequivalence test formulation zolpidem tartrate tablet equivalent oral dose commercially available Ambien速 ( zolpidem tartrate tablet ) adult subject feed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Fed Bioequivalence Study Zolpidem Tartrate Tablets Ambien速 Tablets
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare bioequivalence test formulation zolpidem tartrate tablet equivalent oral dose commercially available Ambien速 ( zolpidem tartrate tablet ) adult subject feed condition . Thirty-eight healthy , non-smoking , non-obese male female volunteer least 18 year age randomly assign crossover fashion receive two zolpidem tartrate dose regimen sequence 7 day washout period dose period . On morning Day 1 , follow overnight fast least 10 hour standardize , high fat breakfast , subject receive either single oral dose test formulation , zolpidem tartrate ( 1 x 10 mg tablet ) single oral dose reference formulation , Ambien速 ( 1 x 10 mg tablet ) . After 7 day washout period , morning Day 8 follow overnight fast least 10 hour standardize , high fat breakfast , subject receive alternate regimen . Blood sample draw participant dose 12 hour post dose time sufficient adequately define pharmacokinetics zolpidem tartrate . A goal study evaluate safety tolerability regimen healthy volunteer . Subjects monitor throughout confinement portion study adverse reaction study drug and/or procedure . Blood pressure pulse rate obtain prior dose 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 4 12 hour post-dose . All adverse event whether elicited query , spontaneously report observed clinic staff evaluate investigator report subject 's case report form .
DOC.criteria: Sex : Male Female ; similar proportion preferred Age : At least 18 year Weight : must 15 % ideal weight height frame Subjects must good health physical condition determine medical history Subjects must read sign Consent Form history treatment alcoholism , substance abuse , drug abuse within past 24 month history malignancy , stroke , diabetes , cardiac , renal liver disease history GERD , malabsorption syndrome , colon cancer , chronic colitis , include Crohn 's disease history treatment asthma within past five ( 5 ) year history mental depression , pulmonary disease , sleep apnea female pregnant lactate history hypersensitivity zolpidem tartrate , hypnotic sedative condition upon screen might contraindicate require caution use administration zolpidem tartrate , include sit systolic blood pressure 90 mm Hg , diastolic pressure 50 mm Hg ; heart rate le 50 beat per minute 5minute rest seat position inability read and/or sign consent form treatment investigation drug four ( 4 ) week prior initial dose study subject donate blood within four ( 4 ) week prior initial dose study subject smoke use tobacco product currently use nicotine product ( patch , gum , etc . ) Three ( 3 ) month abstinence require .
